answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology community!  Gastroparesis is actually pretty common in type 2 diabetics.  Gastroparesis means that your stomach empties slowly.  Dietary changes you can make are eating a low-fiber, low-fat diet and eating many small meals throughout the day.  Also, you should see a gastroenterologist and you might be put on a medication for gastroparesis.
